name: Archery Defence VR
description:
Summary

You are a ranger, protecting your keep from enemy invades while your lord is away. Defeat waves of enemies with a variety of arrow types to stop your keep being burnt to the ground.

Current Features:

  • Archery
  • VR Movement
  • Arrow Types
    • Standard Arrows
    • Fire Arrows
    • Ice Arrows
    • Bomb Arrows
  • Enemy Pathfinding

Controls

Left Track Pad = Change Arrow Type.

Right Trigger = Draw/Loose Arrow.

Left Track Pad = Movement.

Left Trigger = Currently Unassigned.

Left Grip = Anchor Book To Hand or Belt.

Recommended Settings

Developed and Tested with HTC Vive.

May not run correctly with Oculus Rift.

Any feedback is appreciated.

University Third Year Project.
